body.description: 100% Vegetarian ingredients. New look. Therapeutic, repairing care for actively inflamed, damaged skin. Hypo-allergenic. No animal testing, synthetic fragrances, artificial colors, parabens, phthalates, sulfates. The extra care package for miserable skin. If your skin is under assault from the elements or flares associated with eczema, psoriasis or drying medications, then this creamy concoction provides a daily dose of self-defense. A soothing and hypo-allergenic blend of bamboo and aloe extracts, cannabis oil, oatmeal and turmeric deliver intense moisturization and help calm inflammation. Aaaahhhh, relief.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Alba Botanica Very Emollient Herbal Healing Lotion Moisturize and nourish sensitive skin with Alba Botanica Very Emollient Herbal Healing Lotion. Made with 0.4% colloidal oatmeal, our rich lotion soothes and calms inflamed, damaged skin. Botanical extracts such as aloe, bamboo, cannabis oil and turmeric provide therapeutic, repairing care for dry skin. Our 100% vegetarian formula is hypo-allergenic and does not contain any parabens, phthalates or synthetic fragrances. It is also not tested on animals.

Leaping Bunny Certified* Alba Botanica is grounded in compassion and the ethical treatment of all living things. We look out for our furry friends by ensuring that none of our products, or any of the ingredients in them, are tested on animals. The Leaping Bunny* logo is an internationally recognized symbol for cruelty-free cosmetics, personal care, and household products. *Certification for cruelty free was given by the CCIC on October 1st, 2008. 100% Vegetarian* We love our friends, including the furry kind. That’s why we never test our products or any of the ingredients in them on animals. Our products contain no meat or by-products of animals. We also exclude all cruelly obtained animal ingredients. *see ingredients list Paraben Free Many of Alba Botanica products are packaged in bottles made from 100% post-consumer resin. Our unit cartons are made with FSC certified paperboard to ensure that the paper stock was sustainably sourced.

The Alba Botanica brand was born in 1979 and follows a simple mission – to Do Beautiful. To honor that vision, we created a vibrant line of body-loving products that nourish the skin, hair, and of course, the soul. Whether we’re creating a fan favorite formula or working on the next big thing, we’re dedicated to making high quality, 100% vegetarian products that overflow with botanical ingredients. From the choices we make in the field to the final products we put on shelves, we aim to help fellow women look beautiful on the outside while feeling beautiful on the inside.

Very Emollient Maximum Body Lotion Very Emollient Original Body Lotion Very Emollient Herbal Healing Bath & Shower Gel Very Emollient Coconut Rescue Body Lotion More Very Emollient Body Care Products from Alba Botanica Botanicals such as aloe vera, green tea and chamomile are combined with antioxidants and alpha hydroxy acids to relieve dry, irritated skin. Made with botanical emollients such as shea butter, avocado oil and jojoba seed oil, this rich lotion hydrates and softens dry skin without a heavy or greasy feeling. Made with botanicals such as bamboo, rosewater and cannabis oil, this rich-lathering cleanser provides therapeutic, repairing care for sensitive skin. This rich, creamy lotion is made with virgin, unrefined coconut oil and coconut milk to nourish and intensely hydrate skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love how well this works and how good it smells! It’s definitely a thicker lotion, but it just melts into my skin and smells amazing! The scent doesn’t last that long, so it doesn’t clash with my perfume either. It smells so good though when I put it on and it instantly makes my dry, itchy skin feel better! It’s going to be my new go-to lotion for sure! I even use it on my face and it doesn’t make my face break out or burn! I wish I knew about this sooner! It’s so hard to find the perfect lotion. I’ve not seen this at the stores either, so hopefully it stays on Amazon! It was packaged extremely well too. I received it intact without any leakage. I really do buy a lot of different creams and lotions because I can never find one that meets all of my needs, but this one checks all the boxes for me and just feels nice to apply! I really cannot stress enough how clean and yummy it smells, either. Plus, it feels cooling upon application. I would love to find it in a little trial size bottle to keep in my purse! I will be repurchasing! It’s a huge bottle too for a very reasonable price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Lightweight texture. Pleasant botanical scent. My skin is very soft with a healthy glow. I use it after showering before drying off mostly. My skin had been less itchy. Works great after hair removal for the gamut. I tried it on my face during the dry weeks after microderm because I'm out of a face cream. Worked just as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Moisturizing Body Lotion!
reviews.reviewText: FantastIc for dry skin! Wow! It's very thick, but absorbs quickly into the skin, leaving soft, healthy skin without the greasy feel. Don't be deceived by this lotion's initial application - it will absorb quickly, in just a few minutes with no stickiness.What kind of NOLA Voodoo is in this magic potion? Hands-down the best lotion for dry hands & feet. I'm going to try other products from this line!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good overall body lotion. Not a great smell
reviews.reviewText: I like this overall and it works really well! The smell is just a little off. It’s not terrible but it’s maybe the smell of aloe or something similar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soothing and intense
reviews.reviewText: Really soothing and long lasting. My skin immediately looked and felt so much better!! I use as hand cream and body lotion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this lotion
reviews.reviewText: Very nice quality product. Love the scent

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice ingredients, subpar product
reviews.reviewText: Despite having pretty solid ingredients, the scent was hit or miss; my friend liked the smell but I didn't. That said, nobody who tried the lotion enjoyed the feel. It's sticky and doesn't seem to absorb into the skin, nor did it moisturize well. Instead, it seemed to deposit on the surface of the skin. Maybe it'd be a decent lotion for body massages, but not worth it in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I use this lotion every day.
reviews.reviewText: Long lasting moisture and a rich, silky feel makes this lotion my go-to for daily dry skin needs.
